name: Double Crossed
description:
Double Crossed

This heist's target is Olive's fine oil tank.

Overcome the safety systems of the vault without getting caught by the guards and the civilians or be prepared to face serious threats. Steal as much oil as you can, both from the main tank and from the barrels laying around.

Bring the precious fuel back to your bike or sell it to the merchant to upgrade your gear.

Try by any means to be the most efficient robber, even if that involves ... incapacitating your so called "partner"...

Made in 96h by HT

Controls :

Player 1 Keyboard / Player 2 Controller

  • ZQSD / Left Stick : Movement
  • Mouse / Right Stick : Aim
  • E / A : Interact
  • Space / Right Bumper : Melee
  • Right CLick / Left Trigger : Use Item
  • Left Click / Right Trigger : Shoot
